Description:
Adaptive Biotechnologies’ immunoSEQ® Technology is an end-to-end immunosequencing solution capable of profiling millions of B- and T-cell receptors at high throughput and providing a quantitative view into the immune repertoire.  Join us at our Exhibitor Spotlight Theater titled: Utilizing immunosequencing to study oncology targets and therapies.  Presented by Patrick Raber, Ph.D., with guest speakers Kellie N. Smith, Ph.D. and Theodore Scott Nowicki, M.D., Ph.D. to learn about:

•       The principles behind the immunoSEQ Technology (Dr. Raber)

•       Immuno-oncology target identification using coupled immunogenomics (Dr. Smith)

•       Transgeneic T-cell receptor adoptive cell therapies: addressing epigenetic suppression & optimizing therapies with immunosequencing (Dr. Nowicki)
SearchResultBody: ESP13. Adaptive Biotechnologies: Utilizing Immunosequencing to Study Oncology Targets and Therapies
Title: Adaptive Biotechnologies: Utilizing Immunosequencing to Study Oncology Targets and Therapies
